properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE (BOARD_TYPE = 1) AND STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NICKNAME, B.ADDRESS, B.CREATE_DATE, COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE=1 AND B.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, ADDRESS) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, 1, ?,?,2,?)
